page.title: 18All Saints Church, Aston
page.content: { {All Saints Church,Aston}dates back to {Saxon}times and has a long and interesting history of changes.The {Normans}designed the first stone church in Aston and since then a lot of changes have taken place. In the last few years the old earth floor and the pews have been changed and the{stone Saxon altar}has been moved forward from the back of the chancel.The bells have been painted and the church has a new roof.In the week not a lot of people attend church but on Sunday about 180 come. { The Rector's job}is to take services inside the church and he also takes {services in hospitals and homes.He {visits the sick and elderly}and takes Marriage,Funeral and Christening Services.He teaches people who want to be full members of the Church.
